tool.name: qiime gneiss balance-taxonomy
tool.command:
qiime gneiss balance-taxonomy
#if str( $id_to_taxonomy_fp.selector ) == 'history' #set $tax = $id_to_taxonomy_fp.taxonomy_fp --i-taxonomy '$tax' #else: #set $tax = $id_to_taxonomy_fp.taxonomy_fp.fields.path --i-taxonomy '$tax' #end if
--i-table=$itable --i-tree=$itree --p-balance-name="$pbalancename"
#if $metadatafile: --m-metadata-file=$metadatafile #end if
#if str($ppseudocount): --p-pseudocount=$ppseudocount #end if
#if str($ptaxalevel): --p-taxa-level=$ptaxalevel #end if
#if str($pnfeatures): --p-n-features=$pnfeatures #end if
#if str($pthreshold): --p-threshold="$pthreshold" #end if #if str($mmetadatacolumn): --m-metadata-column="$mmetadatacolumn" #end if
--o-visualization=ovisualization ; qiime tools export --input-path ovisualization.qzv --output-path out && mkdir -p '$ovisualization.files_path' && cp -r out/* '$ovisualization.files_path' && mv '$ovisualization.files_path/index.html' '$ovisualization'

param.label: --i-table: ARTIFACT FeatureTable[Frequency] A table of abundances. [required]
param.name: itable

param.label: --i-tree: ARTIFACT The tree used to calculate the balances. Hierarchy [required]
param.name: itree

param.label: --i-taxonomy: ARTIFACT FeatureData[Taxonomy] Taxonomy information for the OTUs. [required]
param.name: itaxonomy

param.label: --p-balance-name: TEXT Name of the balance to summarize. [required]
param.name: pbalancename

param.label: --p-pseudocount: NUMBER The pseudocount to add to avoid division by zero. [default: 0.5]
param.name: ppseudocount

param.label: --p-taxa-level: INTEGER Level of taxonomy to summarize. [default: 0]
param.name: ptaxalevel

param.label: --p-n-features: INTEGER The number of features to plot in the proportion plot. [default: 10]
param.name: pnfeatures

param.label: --p-threshold: NUMBER A threshold to designate discrete categories for a numerical metadata column. This will split the numerical column values into two categories, values below the threshold, and values above the threshold. If not specified, this threshold will default to the mean. [optional]
param.name: pthreshold

param.label: --m-metadata-column: COLUMN MetadataColumn[Categorical | Numeric] Metadata column for plotting the balance (optional). [optional]
param.name: mmetadatacolumn

tool.help:
Balance Summary ###############
Visualize the distribution of a single balance and summarize its numerator and denominator components.
Parameters ---------- table : FeatureTable[Frequency] A table of abundances. tree : Hierarchy The tree used to calculate the balances. taxonomy : FeatureData[Taxonomy] Taxonomy information for the OTUs. balance_name : Str Name of the balance to summarize. pseudocount : Float, optional The pseudocount to add to avoid division by zero. taxa_level : Int, optional Level of taxonomy to summarize. n_features : Int, optional The number of features to plot in the proportion plot. threshold : Float, optional A threshold to designate discrete categories for a numerical metadata column. This will split the numerical column values into two categories, values below the threshold, and values above the threshold. If not specified, this threshold will default to the mean. metadata : MetadataColumn[Categorical | Numeric], optional Metadata column for plotting the balance (optional).
Returns ------- visualization : Visualization
